title: Love how people think they're good when
body:
When the enemy bot lane beats my bot lane because they're probably elo boosted and lose the game just by themselves then the enemy Thresh thinks he's so good by typing with grammar like "I am good." The only hooks he landed all game were on our elo boosted bot lane and he thought he was so good.

I laugh at those people.

replies.body: do you ever do anything apart from complain? that is the only thing i have ever seen you do, complain. all the time. no one %%%%ing cares about you and your %%%%ty little elo problems.

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=k0tuqzTV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-26T08:39:56.500+0000)
>
> do you ever do anything apart from complain? that is the only thing i have ever seen you do, complain. all the time. no one %%%%ing cares about you and your %%%%ty little elo problems.

Watch out, you could get banned. I got warned the other day for calling an idiot an idiot.

> [{quoted}](name=PRIMAWESOME,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=k0tuqzTV,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-02-26T11:45:03.540+0000)
>
> Watch out, you could get banned. I got warned the other day for calling an idiot an idiot.

I haven't been banned yet. with the amount of my %%%% that's been removed i won't be surprised if it happens soon though.

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=k0tuqzTV,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2015-02-26T11:49:12.029+0000)
>
> I haven't been banned yet. with the amount of my %%%% that's been removed i won't be surprised if it happens soon though.

Fair enough, they don't sound as strict as I thought then if you have had several things removed.
ezpz don't read his comments, shrekt.

> [{quoted}](name=Wiggy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=k0tuqzTV,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-02-26T11:32:26.332+0000)
>
> ezpz don't read his comments, shrekt.

i've blacklisted him and I've blacklisted you too.

Viktor, m8, I always see you complaining about everyone else.

You are like "HOW DARE SOMEONE GET OUTCLASSED" when you get outclassed all the time.
Don't give me any %%%% about "But this lane lost and that put me at a disadvantage!"  Every game someone loses lane and gets behind. Its how the game works. If it didn't work like that then no one would ever win. Stop %%%%%ing and blaming other people.

I've looked at your match history, and there is quite a few games where you could have done much better.

Instead, just look at yourself for once. You never post "Wow, I could do better here", but instead always post "EVERYONE IS %%%% ERUUURHNVJN".

ezpz.

shrek skrubz daily.

gg shrekt.

trolol pwnt.
if you play ranked youre gonna have a bad dayyyy
